hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin 'Umar that:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The sun and moon do not become eclipsed for death or birth of anyone, rather they are two of the signs of Allah (SWT) the Most High, so when you see that then pray

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِالصَّلاَةِ عِنْدَ كُسُوفِ الشَّمْسِ
chapter.eng-name: The command to pray when there is a solar eclipse
